standup.title: Zoom way in
standup.summary: Shuffle the cards on your team wall. Select one randomly and only talk about that one card as a team
standup.description: Shuffle the cards on your team wall. Select one randomly and only talk about that one card as a team. For teams with digital walls, pop your open story numbers into a little Math.random function to pick a card at random.
benefits: Allows the team to discuss something in as much detail as they like

You may notice sometimes the discussion will be detailed and lengthy and other times the discussion will be very short. This may tell you something about the variety of cards on your wall, the size of the work, or whether some kinds of tasks are more involved.
